item.title: Considering a mortgage refi? Lower rates are just one factor when refinancing a home loan
item.description: Mortgage rates havenâ€™t been this attractive in more than a year, good news for homeowners eager to refinance.

item.title: One Extraordinary (Olympic) Photo: Francisco Seco captures unusual image at rhythmic gymnastics
item.description: AP photographer Francisco Seco explains how he took the photo of Bulgarian Stiliana Nikolova performing in the rhythmic gymnastics competition.

item.title: Travis Scott is arrested at a Paris hotel after altercation with a security guard, prosecutors say
item.description: French prosecutors say rapper Travis Scott has been arrested at a Paris hotel after an altercation with a security guard.
